refentry:
$Date$ $Revision$
elements objectinfo objectinfo Element
objectinfo &objectinfo.purpose;
&objectinfo.synopsis.gen; Description
The ObjectInfo element is a wrapper for the meta-information about a video, audio, image, or text object.
Processing expectations
&format.suppress; Many of the elements in this wrapper may be used in presentation, but they are not generally printed as part of the formatting of the wrapper. The wrapper merely serves to identify where they occur.
&FutureChanges;
DocBook DTDChanges for V4.0
AuthorBlurb and Affiliation will be removed from the inline content of DivisionInfo in DocBook V4.0. A new wrapper element will be created to associate this information with authors, editors, and other contributors.
&objectinfo.parents.gen; &objectinfo.children.gen;
See Also &objectinfo.seealso.gen;
Examples
For examples, see &objectinfo.example.seealso.gen;.
